text.13_Chapter, 14_Verse: When the king hears [and agrees] to save his handmaiden from the [avenger] man's hand who would destroy me and my son together from the inheritance [given by] God.
text.17_Chapter, 11_Verse: And the dude said to Yoav: Bro, I just found the evil guy on a banana papaya tree. Let's go murder him ruthlessly, against the king's orders.
